results.title: Essence of Terror
results.brief_description: An inquisitive young boy explores the contents of the medicine cabinet and is tempted into trying the jar labelled ‘Adol Essence’… He is plunged into a world of terror as his body starts to change in alarming new ways.

results.title: Deeth treo
results.brief_description: A surreal cut-out animation of a lone horse seen travelling the desert with a mortally wounded knight strapped to his back. The horse in collusion with the tree delivers the corpse to sate the tree’s canabalistic desires. A black comedy.

results.title: The Albatross
results.brief_description: This claymation tells the story of a lone desert dweller. The ‘humanoid’ animal one day comes across an injured albatross and sets about to nurture the bird back to health. Later in her explorations of the day she comes across a caged and abandoned male counterpart and proceeds to help him also. On contact with the male she telepathically sees the mans troubled past (the cause of his present condition) and responds with empathy and friendship.
results.description: This claymation tells the story of a lone desert dweller. The ‘humanoid’ animal one day comes across an injured albatross and sets about to nurture the bird back to health. results.title: An afternoon with...
results.brief_description: This humourous cut-out animation of two friends Ana and Roxi having afternoon tea, gives new meaning to the words “Have a waifer with your tea”, when one woman is offered a waif instead. Co-created by Jeong Kyu Kim and Sophie Raymond.

results.title: RMIT AIM Collection 1992
results.brief_description:
Compilation of student work from the University of RMIT Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) Department. 1992.
The Centre for Animation and Interactive Media, its courses, facilities, staff and collection of work was transferred from Swinburne University of Technology to RMIT University in 1995.

results.title: Yum yum noodles
results.creator_credit: David Atkinson, John Bird, Troy Innocent and Elena Popa
results.brief_description: Time for a bowl of something hot, wet and instant - Yum Yum noodles. Buy some today! MSG added for good tasty flavour. A parody of a noodle advertisment that comments on stereotypes of Asian cultures.

results.title: Transylvanian skies
results.creator_credit: Axyl Lottie, John Bird, David Atkinson and Jos Valdman
results.brief_description: A post-apocalyptic vision of planet Earth as an overcrowded place, plunged in constant darkness and ruled by a new breed of vampire: the Technospheratus.

results.title: Sleep with the fishes
results.brief_description: In this parody of every film noir film ever made, a lowly flamingo who has crossed the mob is outfitted with concrete booties and desptached to join other such ornamental totems.

results.title: Sintu
results.creator_credit: Elena Popa, David Atkinson and John Bird
results.brief_description: Two dancers entwine and dance to the music of Third Eye. The mix of animation with live action creates a sense of emotional or felt response to the musicical soundtrack. A kaleidescope of colours.
